channel.title: [pi] need some help if you can [hunter]
channel.description:
if any of you have read im reworking the [pi] hunter skill completly sofar i really havnt gotten that far due to the fact i can figure out gow to remove and npc without sending it trough the isdead thing witch wont work the way i want it to, if anyone can give me or come up with a way to remove an npc from the game after its spawned without killing it that would be wonderful
PLEASE HELP ME!!!
